body.p: After the login to the @product.name@, you will redirect to the @product.name@ home page. Click on the "processes" under the "Business processes". It will show the currently deployed processes.

Click on the process. It will show the details of the Process. (Figure 2)
To try the process click on the "Create Instance". It will open an another Web browser window. (Figure 3) Add the required input parameters. Then click operation name button, then it will show the answer in the window.

p.i: SOAP UI tool is also an alternative to test a business process. Using SOAP UI application we can see the request/response soap messages. It will more helpful the error handling purposes.
